turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, which Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Hawthorne, near Cesar Chavez

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what do you want from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti Iced Latte with whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just one right? Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope just that one drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a bit of brown sugar like usual.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want this coffee now or sometime later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I'll put the order in for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK it will be ready for pickup soon. And they'll send a receipt to your phone in a moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Can you go pick it up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah of course. I'll head out now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, anything else I can help you with for now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that's it. Cheers

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you later.
